content.question: According to lines 1-2 (At . . . haesit), what is one physical effect of Aeneas’ reaction? Write out the Latin to support your answer.

frqParts.text: According to lines 1-2 (At . . . haesit), what is one physical effect of Aeneas’ reaction? Write out the Latin to support your answer.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
